comment.text: Receptor for arginine vasopressin. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which activate adenylate cyclase. Involved in renal water reabsorption.
Interacts with ARRDC4 (PubMed:23236378). Identified in a complex containing at least ARRDC4, V2R and HGS (PubMed:23236378). Interacts with TMEM147 (PubMed:21056967).

disease.name: Nephrogenic syndrome of inappropriate antidiuresis
disease.description: Characterized by an inability to excrete a free water load, with inappropriately concentrated urine and resultant hyponatremia, hypoosmolarity, and natriuresis.

comment.text: The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry.

disease.name: Diabetes insipidus, nephrogenic, X-linked
disease.description: A disorder caused by the inability of the renal collecting ducts to absorb water in response to arginine vasopressin. Characterized by excessive water drinking (polydipsia), excessive urine excretion (polyuria), persistent hypotonic urine, and hypokalemia.

comment.text: The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry.
Belongs to the G-protein coupled receptor 1 family. Vasopressin/oxytocin receptor subfamily.

property.value: Vasopressin regulates renal water homeostasis via Aquaporins
Defective AVP does not bind AVPR2 and causes neurohypophyseal diabetes insipidus (NDI)
Expressed in apex of heart and 129 other tissues
P:adenylate cyclase-modulating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
P:negative regulation of cell population proliferation
P:negative regulation of renal sodium excretion
P:positive regulation of cell population proliferation
P:positive regulation of systemic arterial blood pressure
P:regulation of systemic arterial blood pressure by vasopressin

feature.description: In XNDI; binding capacity is 10% of wild-type, but binding affinity is stronger than wild-type; dbSNP:rs104894760.
In XNDI; fails to activate the adenylyl cyclase system; dbSNP:rs104894756.
In a breast cancer sample; somatic mutation; dbSNP:rs149668713.
Reduced palmitoylation, reduced cell surface localization but coupling to G protein unaffected.
Reduced palmitoylation, reduced cell surface localization but coupling to G protein unaffected.
